argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_difreicc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( RR \ ( A [,] B ) ) = ( ( -oo (,) A ) u. ( B (,) +oo ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_retop | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top |
| 3 |  | #P_iooretop | |- ( -oo (,) A ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_iooretop | |- ( B (,) +oo ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_unopn | |- ( ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top /\ ( -oo (,) A ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ ( B (,) +oo ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) -> ( ( -oo (,) A ) u. ( B (,) +oo ) ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mp3an | |- ( ( -oo (,) A ) u. ( B (,) +oo ) ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( RR \ ( A [,] B ) ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_iccssre | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A [,] B ) C_ RR ) |
| 9 |  | #P_uniretop | |- RR = U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_iscld2 | |- ( ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top /\ ( A [,] B ) C_ RR ) -> ( ( A [,] B ) e. ( Clsd ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) <-> ( RR \ ( A [,] B ) ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 8, 10 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( A [,] B ) e. ( Clsd ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) <-> ( RR \ ( A [,] B ) ) e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A [,] B ) e. ( Clsd ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
